name: Storm Over The Desert 89'
description:
The president has been assassinated.  Left with no leads and no other options, secret agent Badger will need to play Storm Over the Desert 89, a virtual reality MMO Life sim created in 1988, to look for clues.  In order to get through the game he will need to platform across various levels to collect soy sauce which will then open brand new worlds.  Will Badger find the truth and if so will he be able to handle it?

This game was made in 40 days to get extra practice programming.  I hope you guys enjoy the game!
